name: Lucky Cave
description:
This is the mobile game that we made for our end of 2nd Year at the ETPA.

This is a 1v1 game.

You have only one objectif collect more gold nuggets than the other player.

Team : 

Thomas Boyer : Art and Game Design

Matteo Gaulmier : Art and Game Design

Arnaud Fidel : Fx

Charly Lecoq : Developer and Game Design

Benoit debono : Game Design and FX
